LanguageData.GameUpdatedToNewVersionInitial: RimWorld has been updated from version {0} to version {1}.\n\nThis may cause saved games and mods from the old version to stop working.
LanguageData.GameUpdatedToNewVersionNonSteam: Since this is a DRM-free copy, you can install the game twice in two different folders, to be able to play both old and new versions.
LanguageData.GameUpdatedToNewVersionSteam:
If you wish to continue with the old version, you can opt in using Steam's "Betas" feature.

 1. In the Steam library, right-click RimWorld.
 2. Click Properties.
 3. Click the Betas tab.
 4. Select the version you want from the drop-down menu.

Old versions will be likely removed from this list eventually - we just didn't want to cut off games in progress.

Note that if mod authors update their mods for a new game version, they'll probably stop working on an old version. You may want to turn off automatic updates to prevent this.
LanguageData.RecoveredFromErrorsText:
Näyttää siltä, että jotkin käytössä olevista modeista aiheuttivat virheitä.

Ne olivat epäyhteensopivia toistensa kanssa, suunniteltu toiselle RimWorldin versiolle tai vioittuneita.

Kaikki modit on otettu pois käytöstä ja voidaan ottaa uudelleen käyttöön modivalikosta.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingAssets: An error occured while loading game assets. See error log for more information.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingAssets_ModsInfo: The game is currently running with custom mods - they may or may not cause these problems.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileGeneratingMap: An error occured while generating a new map. See error log for more information.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingMap: An error occured while loading a map. See error log for more information.
LanguageData.ModWithAssemblyWasUnloaded: The game can't fully unload modified code from deactivated mods, so code from deactivated mods may still be active.\n\nIt's recommended that you quit and restart the game now to load all mods cleanly.
LanguageData.SteamClientMissing:
Could not initialize Steam API. Possible causes:

-Steam is not running.
-Launched from outside Steam without steam_appid.txt in place.
-Running with different privileges than Steam client (e.g. "as administrator").

In most cases, rebooting your computer will fix this problem.

You can play anyway, but no Steam stats will be recorded and Steam features won't be available.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromDifferentGameVersion: Käynnissä oleva versio on {0} mutta tallennettu data on versiosta {1}, joka on täysin eri versio.\n\nTämän datan lataaminen ei luultavasti tule toimimaan.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromDifferentGameBuild: Käynnissä oleva versio on {0} mutta tallennettu data on versiosta {1}, joka on eri koontiversiosta.\n\nTämän datan lataamisen pitäisi silti toimia.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromThisGameBuild: Tallennustiedosto on tehty tämän pelin versiolla ja pitäisi toimia ongelmia.
LanguageData.SaveIsUnknownFormat: Tallennusdata on tuntematonta formaattia eikä lähes varmasti tule latautumaan oikein.
LanguageData.NamePlayerFactionMessage: {0} thinks that you should give your faction a name. What should your faction be called?
LanguageData.PlayerFactionGainsName: Your faction is now known as {0}.
LanguageData.NamePlayerFactionBaseMessage: Since it looks like you'll be here for a while, {0} thinks that you should give this community a name. What should the local community be called?
LanguageData.PlayerFactionBaseGainsName: This community is now known as {0}.
LanguageData.NamePlayerFactionBaseMessage_NameFaction: Since it looks like you'll be here for a while, {0} also thinks that you should give community a name. What should this local community be called?
LanguageData.PlayerFactionAndBaseGainsName: Your faction is now known as {0}, and this community is now known as {1}.
LanguageData.NameIsInvalid: Ole hyvä ja syötä kelvollinen nimi.
LanguageData.ConfirmResolutionChange: Vaihdoit resoluutiota. Toimiiko uusi kunnolla?\n\nAutomaattinen palautus {0}...
LanguageData.ResearchMenuWithoutBench: Ennen kuin rakennat TUTKIMUSPÖYDÄN, yhdyskuntalaisesi eivät pysty tekemään tutkimusta.\n\nVoit kuitenkin tarkastella vaihtoehtoja ja valita tutkimusprojektin jo nyt.
LanguageData.MapTemperatureDangerWarning: Varoitus: Olet laskeutumassa jäiseen ympäristöön. Selviytyminen saattaa olla vaikeaa tai lähes mahdotonta. Jos et halua äärimmäistä haastetta, valitse erilainen paikka tai aloituskuukausi.
LanguageData.MapSizePerformanceWarning:
Varoitus: Suorituskyky saattaa kärsiä suuremmissa kentissä ellei tietokoneesi ole tehokas.

Jos sinulla on huonompi kone, valitse Pieni.

Ludeoninen koko on testaamaton eikä lähes varmasti tule toimimaan hyvin.
LanguageData.PermadeathModeInfo: In permadeath mode, you get one save file and can only save when quitting the game. You cannot reload the game to fix mistakes, and when the colony dies, that's it.\n\nThis is the way RimWorld was meant to be played, with every dramatic turn - whether tragic or hopeful - played out to full impact.
LanguageData.RecipeCannotHaveTargetCount: (Tällä reseptillä ei voi olla kohdemäärää, koska siinä on useampia tai arvaamattomia osia.)
LanguageData.BillRequiresMayVary: (Määrä saattaa vaihdella esineillä, joilla on epästandardi koko, kuten kullalla.)
LanguageData.ThisIsSmallVolume: Tämä on pienikokoinen ainesosa. Tämä tarkoittaa sitä, että jokainen 'yksikkö' on vain 1/20 normaalikokoisen ainesosan määrästä. Siten täyttääksesi saman ainesosavaatimuksen tarvitset 20 kertaa suuremman määrän.
LanguageData.GrowingTimeDesc: Kasvit kasvavat vain osan aikaa päivästä ja vain jos ne on valaistu. Tämä tilasto mittaa aikaa, jonka kasvi tarvitsee todellista kasvamisaikaa kasvaakseen täyteen mittaansa. Todellinen kasvamisaika on yleensä kaksi kertaa pitempi aika. Matalat lämpötilat hidastavat myös kasvien kasvua.
LanguageData.CoverEffectivenessExplanation: How effective this is when used as cover in a gunfight. Higher percentages will block more shots.
LanguageData.WildnessExplanation: Villimpiä eläimiä on luonnostaan vaikeampi kesyttää, kouluttaa ja käsitellä.
LanguageData.AnimalFilthRateExplanation: Animals produce filth when moving around on constructed floors. This is the average amount of such filth produced per {0} cells walked by this creature.\n\nLarger or less pet-like animals produce more filth.
LanguageData.PackAnimalExplanation: Whether this animal is appropriate to use to carry items in a caravan over long distances.
LanguageData.ColonyCount: Miten monta tällaista tavaraa yhdyskunta on valmiina vaihtamaan\n\nVoit myydä kiertoradalla oleville kauppiaille tavaroita, jos ne ovat ulkona ja lähellä kiertoradallista vaihtokauppamajakkaa.
LanguageData.TraderCount: Miten monta tällaista tavaraa vaihtokauppialla on antaa.
LanguageData.YourTradeableSilverTip: Voit käydä vaihtokauppaa vain sillä hopealla joka on lähellä kiertoradallista vaihtokauppamajakkaa eikä ole katon alla.
LanguageData.TraderWillNotTrade: Vaihtokauppias ei suostu vaihtamaan tällaisia tavaroita.
LanguageData.NegotiatorTalkingImpaired:
Neuvottelijasi {0} ei pysty puhumaan kunnolla huonon terveyden vuoksi.

Tällä on vaikutusta vaihtohintoihin.

Harkitse terveemmässä kunnossa olevan neuvottelijan käyttöä.
LanguageData.ConfirmTraderShortFunds: Vaihtokauppiaalla ei ole tarpeeksi hopeaa kauppaa varten. Jatka silti?
LanguageData.TradeMassUsageTooltip: The resulting mass usage and mass capacity.
LanguageData.FormCaravanColonyThingCountTip: How many of this item the colony has ready to give to the caravan.
LanguageData.CaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneColonist: You must assign at least one non-downed colonist.
LanguageData.CaravanCouldNotFindExitSpot: Could not find any valid exit location.
LanguageData.CaravanCouldNotFindReachableExitSpot: Warning: some of the assigned colonists are unable to reach the exit location.
LanguageData.CaravanPawnIsUnreachable: {0} is unreachable by any of the assigned colonists.
LanguageData.CaravanItemIsUnreachableSingle: None of the assigned colonists are able to reach the {0}.
LanguageData.CaravanItemIsUnreachableMulti: None of the assigned colonists are able to reach {0}x {1}.
LanguageData.TooBigCaravanMassUsage: The caravan is not able to carry that much.
LanguageData.CaravanMassUsageTooltip:
Current mass usage and mass capacity.

Mass usage includes the assigned caravan supplies as well as the colonists' current equipment.

You will not be able to send the caravan if the mass usage exceedes capacity.
LanguageData.InfiniteDaysWorthOfFoodInfo: Will never run out of food
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFoodTooltip: An approximate number of days before the caravan runs out of food.\n\nThis takes into account both human and animal food, and shows the worst case scenario. This means that after this many days, at least one person or animal will be out of food.
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFoodWarningDialog: Your caravan only has {0} days worth of food and will become hungry very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.DaysWorthOfFoodWarningDialog_NoFood: Your caravan has no food and will become hungry very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.NoExitDirectionForCaravanChosen: You must choose an exit direction for the caravan.
LanguageData.CaravanFormationProcessStarted: Your colonists will now take the assigned items and leave the area as soon as possible.
LanguageData.SourceCaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneColonist: You must leave at least one non-downed colonist.
LanguageData.SplitCaravanThingCountTip: How many of this item the caravan has ready to give to the new caravan.
LanguageData.SplitCaravanMassUsageTooltip: Current mass usage and mass capacity.
LanguageData.TooBigTransportersMassUsage: The assigned people and items are too heavy for the transport pods.
LanguageData.CantSendEmptyTransportPods: You can't send empty transport pods.
LanguageData.TransporterItemIsUnreachableSingle: There is no path between the transport pods and the {0}.
LanguageData.TransporterItemIsUnreachableMulti: There is no path between the transport pods and {0}x {1}.
LanguageData.TransportersMassUsageTooltip: Current mass usage and mass capacity.\n\nYou will not be able to send the transport pods if the mass usage exceedes capacity.
LanguageData.HistoryUploadMessage: Haluatko lähettää pelitietoja RimWorldin servereille auttaaksesi kehittäjiä tasapainottamaan peliä? Jos sallit, tietosi lähetetään joka {0}:s päivä (ja joissain harvinaisissa tapauksissa kuten pelin lopussa). Yksityisyysasetuksia voidaan muuttaa myöhemmän asetuksista.
LanguageData.HistoryUploadMessagePlayerName: Vaikka pelihistoria lähetetäänkin nimettömänä, voit liittää "käyttäjänimen".
LanguageData.HistoryUploadNoOnce: Älä lähetä tällä kertaa, kysy minulta myöhemmin
LanguageData.DrugPolicyInUse: Drugs policy is in use by {0}.
LanguageData.DrugUsageColumnDesc: How the drug is allowed to be used.
LanguageData.FrequencyColumnDesc: How often the colonists should try to take this drug.
LanguageData.MoodThresholdColumnDesc: The colonists will take this drug only if their mood level is below this threshold.
LanguageData.JoyThresholdColumnDesc: The colonists will take this drug only if their joy level is below this threshold.
LanguageData.TakeToInventoryColumnDesc: An amount of the drug to pick up extra when gathering it for consumption, in order to avoid having to visit the drug stockpile every time.
LanguageData.DrugUsageTipForAddiction:
For addictions

Use this drug to feed already-established addiction needs.

Even if disabled, some characters with specific traits, or on mental breaks, may use the drug anyway.
LanguageData.DrugUsageTipForJoy:
For joy

Use this drug for joy and social purposes.

Even if disabled, some characters with specific traits, or on mental breaks, may use the drug anyway.
LanguageData.DrugUsageTipScheduled: Scheduled\n\nUse this drug on a defined schedule, when specific conditions are met.
LanguageData.NoGrowerCanPlant: {0} requires {1} skill in Growing to sow.\n\nNone of your non-downed growers have this skill, so this plant will not be sown.
LanguageData.ConfirmLeavePrisonersOrAnimalsBehind:
There are still some prisoners or animals left in this area and this is the only caravan they can join at the moment.

If you move your caravan, they won't be able to leave the area until you are back. The prisoners will start escaping, while the animals will keep waiting for you.

If you decide to wait, they will try to join your caravan as soon as possible.

Are you sure you want to move your caravan?
LanguageData.ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog: Do you really want to abandon {0}?
LanguageData.ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_EquipmentAndApp: {0} will take the following items with HIM:
LanguageData.ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_AllColonistsTho: All colonists will get the following thoughts:
LanguageData.ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_IndividualThoug: Abandoning {0} will cause the following people to get the following thoughts:
LanguageData.ConfirmSendNotCompletelyLoadedPods: Pod group isn’t completely loaded. {0} is missing. Launch anyway?
